summary: IT Specialist with extensive experience in server administration, Active Directory, Exchange, virtualization (Hyper-V, vSphere), network security, Help Desk, scripting (PowerShell, VBScript), SANs, GIS (ArcGIS), System Center Operations Manager, and desktop support.

experience.title: Information Technology Specialist I
experience.description: Lan Administrator; installed and maintained over 100 servers; administered a 9-node Hyper-V cluster; managed Exchange 2010, Lync 2013; Active Directory 2012 including user accounts & group policy; Microsoft System Center and Operations Manager 2012; Proofpoint spam filter and iBoss web filter; ArcGIS; AD replication troubleshooting; new employee technology orientations; wrote/modified PowerShell and VBScript; administered VMware vSphere; managed 3 SANs (Nimble, Dell EqualLogic, StorSimple); implemented Alertus desktop alerting; provided high-level technical support and issue resolution.

experience.title: Technology Specialist III
experience.description: Installed and configured HP network switches; programmed switch ports and VLANs; connected and terminated network cables; troubleshoot network port issues; used TCP/IP utilities (ping, tracert, ipconfig) for diagnostics; installed and maintained WhatsUp Gold for network monitoring; managed Blackberry Enterprise Server for Exchange; operated Fedora Core Linux with MRTG; managed two Windows Server 2003 domain controllers and associated education software; oversaw Xiotech SAN and TNT network security appliance; wrote automation scripts (DOS/VBScript) to create ~5,000 student accounts and home folders with appropriate permissions; utilized Group Policy to secure workstations and deploy software; implemented ArcGIS GIS; installed and supported antivirus, Office, Fortress desktop security, Rosetta Stone, Escape Financial System and other education software; used Ghost to image computers; performed LAN administration, Hyper-V server management, and SAN administration; administered Exchange 2010, Proofpoint spam filter, iBoss web filter; System Center Operations Manager; EMC Networker backup; AD and group policy management; analyzed technical issues to improve functionality.
